title: Rilke Interceptor Options Schema
description: Creates a new, generic interceptor definition in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the interceptor?

path.description: The path at which to create the interceptor, relative to the workspace root.

flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project.

layer.description: Determine which layer it belongs to.

x-prompt.message: Which layer would you like to use it in?

module.x-prompt: Which NgModule would you like to use this interceptor?

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new interceptor.

skipProvide.description: Do not provide this interceptor into the owning NgModule.
